InstalledItem.Name: MSD-683 Missile Rack
InstalledItem.Description:
Item Type: Missile Rack
Manufacturer: Behring
Size: 6
Missiles: 8xS3

Behring’s MSD-683 "Marsden" is a complete ordnance storage and deployment system that can be mounted on any compatible size 6 hardpoint for the reliable and effective launch of eight S3 missiles.

InstalledItem.Name: Arrester III Missile
InstalledItem.Description:
Manufacturer: Firestorm Kinetics
Tracking Signal: Cross Section
Size: 3

Using cross section targeting to hunt for its prey, the Firestorm Arrester proximity missile makes quick work of enemies caught in the crosshairs.

InstalledItem.Name: Suldrath
InstalledItem.Description:
Item Type: Shield Generator
Manufacturer: Banu
Size: 1
Grade: C
Class: Military

Classic Tevarin tech melds with modern design for the Suldrath shield generator. The Banu beautifully blend the best parts of historic Tevarin shield tech with contemporary upgrades and conveniences expected of this component generation. The result is an effective and unique xeno-crafted shield ready to shroud your ship and protect you from whatever dangers come your way.

InstalledItem.Name: Suldrath
InstalledItem.Description:
Item Type: Shield Generator
Manufacturer: Banu
Size: 1
Grade: C
Class: Military

Classic Tevarin tech melds with modern design for the Suldrath shield generator. The Banu beautifully blend the best parts of historic Tevarin shield tech with contemporary upgrades and conveniences expected of this component generation. InstalledItem.Name: Slipstream
InstalledItem.Description:
Item Type: Power Plant
Manufacturer: Tyler Design & Tech
Size: 1
Grade: A
Class: Stealth

Tyler Design & Tech uses an expensive alloy on its Slipstream power plant to reduce its overall emissions. This design choice is key to making this small power plant’s detectable signature one of the lowest on the market.

InstalledItem.Name: FlashFreeze
InstalledItem.Description:
Item Type: Cooler
Manufacturer: Lightning Power Ltd. 
Size: 1
Grade: B
Class: Civilian

With the FlashFreeze, Lightning Power makes sure that no matter how hot things get, you can rely on its proven cooling technology to keep you flying.

InstalledItem.Name: FlashFreeze
InstalledItem.Description:
Item Type: Cooler
Manufacturer: Lightning Power Ltd. 
Size: 1

InstalledItem.Name: Drift
InstalledItem.Description:
Item Type: Quantum Drive
Manufacturer: RAMP Corporation 
Size: 1
Grade: C
Class: Stealth

Built to keep heat and signature levels low, the Drift quantum drive from RAMP Corporation helps to minimize emissions generated while spooling.

InstalledItem.Name: Ecouter
InstalledItem.Description:
Item Type: Radar
Manufacturer: GNP
Size: 1
Grade: C
Class: Military

Space is vast and unknowable, that’s why discerning pilots rely on the Ecouter small radar from GNP to keep them in the know about what’s around them.
